ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands

Class FireTorpedoCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.ShipCommand
      • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.commands.FireTorpedoCommand

  • public class FireTorpedoCommand
extends ShipCommand
    A command to fire a torpedo. Torpedos can be fired from either the front or back of a ship.

      FireTorpedoCommand(char direction)
      Creates a command to fire a torpedo.
